ReportedFailures.Description: remoteDebuggingEnabled set to true in resource
remoteDebuggingEnabled set to true in child config (even though it's false in parent resource)
remoteDebuggingEnabled set to true in resource (even though it's false in child config)
remoteDebuggingEnabled set to true in child config
remoteDebuggingEnabled set to true in dependent config

PassingSections.Explanation: remoteDebuggingEnabled not defined in web app or in child web app config
remoteDebuggingEnabled is false in a child config
remoteDebuggingEnabled is false in a dependent config.  Config with name 'metadata' is not the right config type for this property, so it being defined with 'true' has no effect.
